vocabulary.example: The hurricane was devastating, leaving many homes destroyed.

vocabulary.definition: a comfortable or suitable position in life or employment
vocabulary.example: She found her niche in the art world as a talented sculptor.

vocabulary.definition: relating to a galaxy, especially the Milky Way galaxy
vocabulary.example: The movie depicted a futuristic society with advanced galactic civilizations.

vocabulary.definition: relating to existence, especially human existence
vocabulary.example: The novel delves into deep existential questions about the meaning of life.

vocabulary.definition: seeming difficult to deal with in anticipation; intimidating
vocabulary.example: The task of climbing the mountain alone was daunting, but she was determined to succeed.
